Text.Page:
The argons are here. Of course.

I don't know whether they're working for Thulsa or vice versa.

But their presence is...unnatural. It defiles this place, which is practically sacred to my people!

, punish the argons and their leader, Tarnos, for stepping into our furnace!

Thank you for protecting the furnace. Our ancestors approve of your bravery.

And someday, that bravery will be repaidâ€”with interest!
